Class ContentController<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • windntrees.BasicController
      • windntrees.ContentController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CRUDController

    public class ContentController<T>
extends BasicController
    ContentController produces WindnTrees compliant JSON Object, List and Error responses.
    Author:
    shams
